item.title: better search for windows
item.description: The Windows 10 search is slow and resource intensive. So I decided to build a new one! The new search engine uses a flask-sqlite backend, using a jinja html front end. It first indexes both of the drives and parses their files into the databases in a custom format Then the front-end does a SQL query on the database to find the files. After that the custom jinja templates do a HTML “render” with the data from the query and send it to you!
